duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee day-to-day operations, customer service, staff performance, planning, scheduling, health and safety, and regulatory compliance within assigned function.
Lead and develop exempt and non-exempt employees, and ensure attainment of daily operational goals.
Work within international functional teams, analyze complex problems, and demonstrate professional skills in job-related areas.
Make decisions in a timely manner, maintain professional relationships within all levels of the organization, and operate independently as well as part of a team.
Support off shifts in case of critical customer network disruption or crisis, and ensure compliance with local and federal regulations.
Create and maintain professional relationships, multitask, stay organized, and exhibit attention to detail and excellent follow-up practices.

Utilize MS Office tools, apply advanced logistics knowledge, adhere to local and federal regulations, and possess fundamental knowledge of supply chain management and strong manufacturing and production understanding.
Plan, schedule, staff, and execute day-to-day activities, both as a leader and as a team member.
Exhibit flexibility, self-driven attitude, and capability to handle a fast-paced environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Logistics, Supply Chain (Master's preferred)
